title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Get ready for the most epic meme token in the crypto space: PepeTrumpToken! Combining the meme magic of Pepe the Frog and the controversial persona of former US President Donald Trump, this token aims to create a fun, engaging, and secure community for crypto enthusiasts and meme lovers. Join the PepeTrump movement and experience the power of meme culture with a touch of political satire.Tokenomics:Total tax: 5%Marketing: 2%Liquidity Pool (LP): 3%Contract Address: 0xC117fe5f09afc975c8d4e3b8438a7ccEc425DD96Project Goals:Foster a vibrant community of like-minded individuals who appreciate the humor and creativity behind the Pepe-Trump concept.Disrupt the crypto market with a unique, entertaining, and engaging token.Maintain hype and excitement around the project through marketing efforts and community involvement.Roadmap:Q1 2023:Launch PepeTrumpTokenBuild community and social media presenceFirst round of marketing campaignsQ2 2023:Listing on popular exchangesFurther marketing efforts and strategic partnershipsExpansion of the community and project ecosystemQ3 2023:Launch of a decentralized application (dApp) for community engagement and rewardsFurther development and expansion of project ecosystemContinued marketing efforts and community growthQ4 2023:Evaluate the feasibility of creating a PepeTrump NFT marketplaceEngage in charitable initiatives to give back to the communityContinued project development, marketing, and community expansionTeam:The PepeTrumpToken team is a diverse group of experienced professionals in the fields of blockchain technology, marketing, and community management. The team is passionate about creating a unique and entertaining project that brings together the power of memes and political satire to disrupt the crypto market.══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════Learn more about PepeTrumpToken:Website: https://pepetrumpp.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrumpPepeTokenTelegram: https://t.me/PepeTrumpOfficial[/b]
